title: SmiGy Paya Lebar Quarter Mall Playground Venue
blurb: Indoor playground at Paya Lebar Quarter Mall.
description: SmiGy at Paya Lebar Quarter Mall offers a safe and engaging indoor playground experience for children. The facility includes various play areas designed to stimulate creativity and physical activity. It is an ideal location for families looking to provide their children with a fun and active playtime environment. The playground features soft play equipment, climbing structures, and interactive games suitable for toddlers and older kids. Parents can relax in designated seating areas while supervising their children. SmiGy is committed to providing a clean and well-maintained space for kids to enjoy.
price_display: $23 for 1 hour (1 adult + 1 child), $35 for 2 hours (1 adult + 1 child)
full_address: Paya Lebar Quarter Mall 10 Paya Lebar Road, PLQ Mall #03-05/06, Singapore

title: SmiGy United Square Shopping Mall Playground
blurb: Indoor playground at United Square Shopping Mall.
description: SmiGy at United Square Shopping Mall provides a fun and stimulating indoor playground for children. The venue features a variety of play zones designed to encourage physical activity and imaginative play. It is a great place for families to spend quality time together while children explore and interact with different play structures. The playground includes soft play areas, climbing frames, and interactive games suitable for a range of ages. Parents can supervise their children from comfortable seating areas. SmiGy is dedicated to maintaining a safe and clean environment for all visitors.
price_display: $23 for 1 hour (1 adult + 1 child), $35 for 2 hours (1 adult + 1 child)
full_address: United Square Shopping Mall, #01-18 to 28, Singapore 307591
